name: Nightmare (itch) (Baudonnel, Panzani-san, Hugo CODINACH, FrUtIlItY, Fugulen, Nicootl)
name_original: Nightmare (itch) (Baudonnel, Panzani-san, Hugo CODINACH, FrUtIlItY, Fugulen, Nicootl)
description:
This game has been made during the ImpactJam.

Dylan and his family have just moved in.

Because he is black, our hero will have to face his new xenophobic classmates.

Project made by :

Hugo Codinach (Hugo CODINACH) : dev

Antoine Laget (Panzani-san) : dev & game designer

Baptiste Cayrier (Fugulen) : dev

Dorian Rigal (FrUtIlItY) : dev

Nicolas Albiges (Nicootl) : Scriptwriter

Clément Baudonnel (Baudonnel) : game designer
